kubejs.ponder.alchemy.alchemy_setup.head: The Thermal Alchemy Setup
kubejs.ponder.alchemy.alchemy_setup.text: Attach a Laser Lamp of any colour
Place a Deployer targeting the Invar Machine
Set it to Punch mode using a Wrench
Ensure that the light is powered
Hopper Minecarts caught in the Beam will process their contained Items
The Hopper Minecart acts as the Item Container in the process
...the Laser Lamp will emit a High-Energy Beam
The Hopper Minecart acts as the Item Container in the process
kubejs.ponder.rocket.rocket_setup.text_4: The Rocket can now be built within these Boundaries
kubejs.ponder.rocket.rocket_setup.text_1: Start by placing down a Launch Pad
kubejs.ponder.rocket.rocket_setup.text_3: Place the Rocket Assembler one block above the perimeter
kubejs.ponder.rocket.rocket_setup.text_2: Attach a Launch Tower to the side of it
kubejs.ponder.rocket.rocket_setup.text_1: Add a Fueling Station by the Assembler...
Open the Assembler UI and 'Scan' the Rocket
If the Rocket is considered valid, press 'Build'
(Don't worry about the brief Screen Freeze - the rocketry mod is in early Development.)
Any fuel added to the Station will now be trasferred to the Rocket
Once the Rocket is assembled, Sneak-Right-Click it to open the Interface
Inside the UI you can insert the Planet Id Chip of the Desired Destination
In order to Fuel the rocket, you first need a Rocket Linking Device
Sneak-Use it on the Fueling Station first, then on the Rocket
